lead_paragraph: Xavier Carter of Louisiana State became the first person to win the 100 meters and the 400 meters at an N.C.A.A. track and field championships yesterday, running down the competition in races just 31 minutes apart.
snippet: Xavier Carter of Louisiana State became the first person to win the 100 meters and the 400 meters at an N.C.A.A. track and field championships yesterday, running down the competition in races just 31 minutes apart.
